name: Apex Defenders
description:
APEX DEFENDERS



Apex Defenders is a survival game that you can play modularly and cooperatively. Try to survive in the abandoned school in the current mode!
Show everyone how much you can withstand hungry zombies!

Base Features:

Wave System : How much challenge can you withstand? Challenge your abilities with the unlimited wave system
Weapon Store: Browse the wide variety of weapons available in the arsenal to equip yourself with your favorite firearms!
4 Person Co-op or Solo Play Mode: Co-op mode for up to four players

Since we are an indie developer, the development of our game takes time. Our dream is to add additional modules to our game and reach a game with creative modes where you can have fun while trying to survive with your friends with modules in different themes on the current version. Endless thanks for supporting us in this adventure.
